section.title: Goal
section.para: crystal_facet_uml creates a set of uml diagrams.
It keeps the diagrams consistent concerning element names and relations between these uml elements.
crystal_facet_uml exports diagrams in various vector and pixel-based image formats.

section.title: Usage Overview
section.para:
If started in graphical mode, it shows a window with
toolbar on top,
drawing area in the center,
element configuration widgets below and
an optional notification bar at the bottom.
Additionally, crystal_facet_uml can be started from command line to check and repair database files. Run
./crystal_facet_uml -h
to get a list of supported parameters.
